title: Google Careers Jobs Scraper
description: Scrape jobs from Google Careers (google.com/about/careers). Provide keyword/location or a direct Google Careers URL.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific Google Careers URL (e.g., https://www.google.com/about/careers/applications/jobs/results?q=engineer). If provided, this will be used instead of Keyword/Location.

keyword.title: Keyword (if not using Start URL)
keyword.description: Job search keyword(s), e.g., 'Software Engineer', 'Product Manager'.

location.title: Location (if not using Start URL)
location.description: Geographic location to search in, e.g., 'Mountain View', 'New York', 'Remote'.

posted_date.title: Posted Date (if not using Start URL)
posted_date.description: Filter jobs by how recently they were posted.

collectDetails.title: Collect job details
collectDetails.description: If enabled, scraper opens job detail pages for full description, qualifications, and salary information. This will take longer but provides more complete data.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of jobs
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of jobs to collect. Set to a high number to collect all available jobs.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: A safety cap on the number of search result pages to visit. Each page typically contains 10-25 jobs.

maxRequestRetries.title: Max request retries
maxRequestRetries.description: Maximum number of times to retry a failed request.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy for the best results and to avoid blocking. Residential proxies recommended for Google.
